Description.Title: SoilTemperature
Description.ExtendedDescription: One-dimensional soil temperature component which represents the soil profile as layers with temperature nodes from the atmosphere through the soil, plus phantom nodes below the profile to a constant-temperature depth. It simulates transient heat conduction with sub-daily time steps (default 48 per day) using a tri-diagonal solver (Thomas algorithm) and a weighted implicit scheme (nu=0.6). Thermal properties are derived from soil physical characteristics (thickness, bulk density, texture, rocks, organic matter) and water content, while atmospheric boundary-layer conductance and net radiation (shortwave and longwave) are calculated from weather inputs (air temperature, radiation, wind, pressure). The model provides daily minimum, maximum, and average soil temperatures by layer and at the surface, as well as thermal conductivity, volumetric heat capacity, heat storage, and boundary-layer conductance, drawing on methods from Campbell (1985).
Description.ShortDescription: 1D soil heat-flow and temperature component using sub-daily energy balance and boundary-layer exchange to produce daily min/avg/max soil temperatures.

Input.name: weather_MeanT
Input.description: Daily mean air temperature

Input.name: weather_Tav
Input.description: Long-term average air temperature

Input.name: weather_Amp
Input.description: Annual temperature amplitude

Input.name: weather_Latitude
Input.description: Site latitude

Input.name: weather_Radn
Input.description: Daily incoming shortwave radiation

Input.name: weather_AirPressure
Input.description: Air pressure

Input.name: weather_MaxT
Input.description: Daily maximum air temperature

Input.name: weather_MinT
Input.description: Daily minimum air temperature

Input.name: weather_Wind
Input.description: Wind speed at instrument height

Input.name: waterBalance_SW
Input.description: Volumetric soil water content by layer

Input.name: waterBalance_Eo
Input.description: Potential evaporation from reference surface

Input.name: waterBalance_Eos
Input.description: Potential soil evaporation

Input.name: waterBalance_Salb
Input.description: Soil surface albedo (fraction)

Input.name: waterBalance_Es
Input.description: Actual soil evaporation rate

Input.name: microClimate_CanopyHeight
Input.description: Canopy height

Input.name: physical_Thickness
Input.description: Soil layer thickness

Input.name: physical_BD
Input.description: Bulk density by layer

Input.name: physical_Rocks
Input.description: Rock fragment content by layer

Input.name: physical_ParticleSizeSand
Input.description: Sand fraction by layer

Input.name: physical_ParticleSizeSilt
Input.description: Silt fraction by layer

Input.name: physical_ParticleSizeClay
Input.description: Clay fraction by layer

Input.name: organic_Carbon
Input.description: Organic carbon content by layer

Input.name: clock_Today_DayOfYear
Input.description: Day of year

Input.name: instrumHeight
Input.description: Configured instrument height (overrides default if > 0)

Input.name: InitialValues
Input.description: Optional initial soil temperature profile (starting from topsoil node)

Input.name: DepthToConstantTemperature
Input.description: Depth at which temperature is held constant in initialization

Input.name: timestep_seconds
Input.description: Duration of a day in seconds used for internal stepping

Input.name: airNode
Input.description: Index of air node

Input.name: surfaceNode
Input.description: Index of soil surface node

Input.name: topsoilNode
Input.description: Index of topsoil node

Input.name: numPhantomNodes
Input.description: Number of phantom nodes appended below soil profile

Input.name: defaultTimeOfMaximumTemperature
Input.description: Hour of day for maximum air temperature

Input.name: instrumentHeight
Input.description: Current instrument height used for wind and conductance calculations

Input.name: numLayers
Input.description: Number of soil layers

Input.name: numNodes
Input.description: Total number of soil nodes (layers + phantom nodes)

Input.name: thickness
Input.description: Node-associated layer thickness including phantom layers

Input.name: nodeDepth
Input.description: Depth of nodes

Input.name: bulkDensity
Input.description: Bulk density profile including phantom nodes

Input.name: soilWater
Input.description: Current volumetric soil water by node/layer

Input.name: carbon
Input.description: Organic carbon by layer including phantom nodes

Input.name: rocks
Input.description: Rock fragment content by layer including phantom nodes

Input.name: sand
Input.description: Sand fraction by layer including phantom nodes

Input.name: silt
Input.description: Silt fraction by layer including phantom nodes

Input.name: clay
Input.description: Clay fraction by layer including phantom nodes

Input.name: maxSoilTemp
Input.description: Daily maximum soil temperature by node

Input.name: minSoilTemp
Input.description: Daily minimum soil temperature by node

Input.name: aveSoilTemp
Input.description: Daily average soil temperature by node

Input.name: volSpecHeatSoil
Input.description: Volumetric specific heat of soil at nodes

Input.name: soilTemp
Input.description: Current soil temperature profile at nodes

Input.name: morningSoilTemp
Input.description: Soil temperature snapshot near 5:00 local time at nodes

Input.name: newTemperature
Input.description: Workspace array for updated temperatures at nodes

Input.name: thermalConductivity
Input.description: Soil thermal conductivity at nodes (plus air node for boundary conductance)

Input.name: heatStorage
Input.description: Effective heat storage per node per time step

Input.name: thermalConductance
Input.description: Thermal conductance between nodes (includes air boundary when used)

Input.name: soilRoughnessHeight
Input.description: Bare soil roughness length used to bound canopy height

Input.name: boundaryLayerConductance
Input.description: Daily average boundary layer conductance over soil surface

Input.name: airTemperature
Input.description: Current air temperature used for timestep computations

Input.name: maxTempYesterday
Input.description: Yesterday's max air temperature used in diurnal interpolation before minimum time

Input.name: minTempYesterday
Input.description: Yesterday's min air temperature used in diurnal interpolation before minimum time

Input.name: netRadiation
Input.description: Net radiation to soil for the last intraday step

Input.name: canopyHeight
Input.description: Current canopy height used in conductance (derived from microClimate_CanopyHeight and roughness)

Input.name: nu
Input.description: Implicitness factor for the Thomas solver

Input.name: boundarLayerConductanceSource
Input.description: Source selection for boundary layer conductance (calc or constant)

Input.name: netRadiationSource
Input.description: Source selection for net radiation (calc)

Input.name: pom
Input.description: Particle density of organic matter

Input.name: ps
Input.description: Particle density of soil minerals

Input.name: soilConstituentNames
Input.description: List of soil constituent names considered in heat property calculations

Output.name: instrumentHeight
Output.description: Updated instrument height considering canopy height

Output.name: soilWater
Output.description: Updated volumetric soil water profile (copied from waterBalance_SW)

Output.name: canopyHeight
Output.description: Derived canopy height used in conductance

Output.name: volSpecHeatSoil
Output.description: Volumetric specific heat at nodes for the current day

Output.name: thermalConductivity
Output.description: Soil thermal conductivity at nodes (air node holds boundary conductance)

Output.name: thermalConductance
Output.description: Inter-node thermal conductance used by Thomas solver

Output.name: heatStorage
Output.description: Node heat storage term for current internal time step

Output.name: soilTemp
Output.description: Updated soil temperature profile at nodes

Output.name: minSoilTemp
Output.description: Minimum soil temperature observed during the day at each node

Output.name: maxSoilTemp
Output.description: Maximum soil temperature observed during the day at each node

Output.name: aveSoilTemp
Output.description: Average soil temperature accumulated over intraday steps

Output.name: boundaryLayerConductance
Output.description: Average boundary layer conductance over the day

Output.name: netRadiation
Output.description: Net radiation to soil for last intraday step

Output.name: morningSoilTemp
Output.description: Soil temperatures near 5:00 stored for reporting/diagnostics

Output.name: maxTempYesterday
Output.description: Updated yesterday max air temperature for next day diurnal interpolation

Output.name: minTempYesterday
Output.description: Updated yesterday min air temperature for next day diurnal interpolation

Function.name: Divide
Function.description: Safe division that returns errVal when denominator is zero.

Function.name: ValuesInArray
Function.description: Checks if an array contains any valid (non-missing) value.

Function.name: Sum
Function.description: Sums values between start and end indices, skipping sentinel 999999.

Function.name: Zero
Function.description: Sets all elements of an array to 0.0.

Function.name: ToCumThickness
Function.description: Converts layer thicknesses to cumulative thickness.

Function.name: kelvinT
Function.description: Converts Celsius to Kelvin.

Function.name: longWaveRadn
Function.description: Computes longwave radiation using Stefan–Boltzmann law.

Function.name: airDensity
Function.description: Computes air density from temperature and pressure.

Function.name: volumetricSpecificHeat
Function.description: Returns specific heat value for the named soil constituent.

Function.name: ThermalConductance
Function.description: Returns conductance-related value per constituent (placeholder behavior).

Function.name: volumetricFractionRocks
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of rocks in a layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionOrganicMatter
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of organic matter in a layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionSand
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of sand in a layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionSilt
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of silt in a layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionClay
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of clay in a layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionWater
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of water in a layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionIce
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of ice in a layer (returns 0.0).

Function.name: volumetricFractionAir
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of air in a layer.

Function.name: shapeFactor
Function.description: Computes geometric shape factor for constituents (placeholder behavior).

Function.name: mapLayer2Node
Function.description: Maps layer properties to nodes by depth-weighted averaging.

Function.name: calcLayerTemperature
Function.description: Computes temperature at depth using a harmonic diurnal formulation.

Function.name: calcSurfaceTemperature
Function.description: Computes soil surface temperature from mean/max T and albedo-scaled radiation.

Function.name: doNetRadiation
Function.description: Distributes daily solar radiation into intraday steps and estimates cloud fraction and vapor parameter.

Function.name: interpolateNetRadiation
Function.description: Computes intraday net radiation at the soil surface (shortwave + longwave).

Function.name: interpolateTemperature
Function.description: Sinusoidal diurnal interpolation of air temperature between min and max.

Function.name: doVolumetricSpecificHeat
Function.description: Computes volumetric specific heat at nodes from constituents and maps to nodes.

Function.name: doThermalConductivity
Function.description: Computes effective thermal conductivity at nodes from constituent properties.

Function.name: doThomas
Function.description: Thomas tridiagonal solver advancing soil temperatures with surface energy balance.

Function.name: getBoundaryLayerConductance
Function.description: Computes aerodynamic + radiative boundary layer conductance over the soil.

Function.name: calcSoilTemperature
Function.description: Initial seasonal soil temperature profile using a damped sinusoid.
